S:log-item.D:comment: DERBY-2618 (partial) Make ClobAsciiStream honour the contract for OutputStream.write(int) by ignoring top 24 bits. Optimize ClobAsciiStream by re-using an array rather than recreating one for each write(byte[]) call. Fix ClobStreamControl to correctly process a Derby UTF8 encoded stream. Does not fix the issue, fixes are being worked on by others under related bugs.
